<small>Also see: [[H8257]]</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁקָה‎</span>] **verb Hiph\`il** ==cause to drink water, give to drink== (Late Hebrew Hiph\`il ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> I. ***give to drink***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סקי‎</span> ***be irrigated*** Fell<sup>ZMG liv (1900), 246,</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מסקי‎</span> ***drinks*** [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 124</sup>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מסתקין‎</span> ***id.*** [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Hofmus., No. 1, l. 7</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***water, irrigate***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ša‡û***</u></abbr> I. = Hebrew Hiph\`il, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁקָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aph\`el); — for **Qal** see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁתָה‎</span>; — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִשְׁקָה‎</span> [[Gen.2.6|Gen 2:6]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִשְׁקָהּ‎</span> [[Num.5.27|Num 5:27]] 2 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִשְׁקִיתָ‎</span> [[Num.20.8|Num 20:8]] +; 1 singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִשְׁקֵיתִי‎</span> [[Ezek.32.6|Ezek 32:6]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׁקֶה‎</span> [[Num.5.26|Num 5:26]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּשְׁקְ‎</span> [[Gen.29.10|Gen 29:10]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁקִ֫הוּ‎</span> [[Prov.25.21|Prov 25:21]] feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁקֹ֫ינִי‎</span> [[Gen.24.43|Gen 24:43]] +; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁקוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.2.10|Gen 2:10]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁקֹתוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.24.19|Gen 24:19]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׁקֶה‎</span> [[Ps.104.13|Ps 104:13]], construct [[Hab.2.15|Hab 2:15]] (see also I., II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׁקֶה‎</span>); — 

**1.** ***water, irrigate***, ground: subject mist [[Gen.2.6|Gen 2:6]], river v[[Gen.2.10|Gen 2:10]] (both [[BDB#J|J]]), spring [[Joel.4.18|Joel 4:18]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Isa.27.3|Isa 27:3]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּרֶם‎</span>), [[Ezek.17.7|Ezek 17:7]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֶּפֶן‎</span>), both in figure, figurative also [[Ezek.32.6|Ezek 32:6]] ***water land*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִדָּם‎</span>; literal with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of source [[Ps.104.13|Ps 104:13]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרִים‎</span>) and (subject man) [[Eccl.2.6|Eccl 2:6]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעַר‎</span>). 

**2.** ***water, give drink to***, usually human subject, accusative of beast, [[Gen.24.14|Gen 24:14]]; [[Gen.24.46|Gen 24:46]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.29.2|Gen 29:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of source), v[[Gen.29.3|Gen 29:3]] v[[Gen.29.7|Gen 29:7]] v[[Gen.29.8|Gen 29:8]] v[[Gen.29.10|Gen 29:10]]; [[Exod.2.16|Exod 2:16]]; [[Exod.2.17|Exod 2:17]]; [[Exod.2.19|Exod 2:19]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Ps.104.11|Ps 104:11]] (subject springs); accusative of person [[Gen.21.19|Gen 21:19]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Gen.24.18|Gen 24:18]]; [[Gen.24.19|Gen 24:19]]; [[Gen.24.45|Gen 24:45]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Hab.2.15|Hab 2:15]] (figurative), [[Isa.43.20|Isa 43:20]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject), [[Ps.78.15|Ps 78:15]] (***id.***), [[2Chr.28.15|2Chr 28:15]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of vessel [[Esth.1.7|Esth 1:7]] with accusative of person and animal. [[Num.20.8|Num 20:8]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); ***give*** one something to ***drink***, accusative of person + of thing (water, wine, etc.), [[Amos.2.12|Amos 2:12]]; [[Gen.19.32|Gen 19:32]]; [[Gen.19.33|Gen 19:33]]; [[Gen.19.34|Gen 19:34]]; [[Gen.19.35|Gen 19:35]]; [[Gen.24.43|Gen 24:43]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Judg.4.19|Judg 4:19]]; [[1Sam.30.11|1Sam 30:11]]; [[2Sam.23.15|2Sam 23:15]] = [[1Chr.11.15|1Chr 11:15]]; [[Job.22.7|Job 22:7]], compare [[Song.8.2|Song 8:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיַּיִן‎</span>); figurative [[Jer.8.14|Jer 8:14]]; [[Jer.9.14|Jer 9:14]]; [[Jer.16.7|Jer 16:7]]; [[Jer.23.15|Jer 23:15]]; [[Jer.25.15|Jer 25:15]]; [[Ps.69.22|Ps 69:22]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנַחַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲדָנֶיךָ תַשְׁקֵם‎</span> [[Ps.36.9|Ps 36:9]], and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּשְׁקֵ֫מוֺ בִּדְמָעוֺת‎</span> [[Ps.80.6|Ps 80:6]] accusative of thing omitted, literal [[Judg.4.19|Judg 4:19]]; [[Exod.32.20|Exod 32:20]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), figurative [[Jer.25.17|Jer 25:17]]. — See also I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׁקֶה‎</span> infra. **Pu\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמֹחַ עַצְמוֺתָיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשֻׁקֶּה‎</span> [[Job.21.24|Job 21:24]] ***the marrow of his bones is watered***, (refreshed, invigorated). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשׁקה‎</span> [[Amos.8.8|Amos 8:8]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁקע‎</span>. p. 1054.
